text: After we moved our site to HubSpot I see that the 404 page is the 3rd loaded page. I found <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Are-there-any-logs-that-can-show-us-which-requests-are/td-p/249153|this question> from two years ago and it says there are no logs in HubSpot to help setting up redirects for those 404s. Is this still the case?
